00044  SUBROUTINE MemAlloc(FLAG)
00045 
00046 ! Common Variables
00047  USE Domain,    ONLY : ni, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00048  USE FluidParams
00049  USE LBMParams, ONLY : f, fbar, fdim, g, gbar, gdim
00050  IMPLICIT NONE
00051 
00052 ! Input/Output Parameters
00053  INTEGER, INTENT (IN) :: FLAG
00054 
00055  IF(FLAG == 1) THEN
00056 
00057 ! Memory allocation for hydrodynamics and neighbor arrays
00058  ALLOCATE(   p(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00059  ALLOCATE( rho(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00060  ALLOCATE( psi(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00061  ALLOCATE(   u(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax,1:2) )
00062  ALLOCATE(  ni(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax,1:4) )
00063 
00064 ! Memory allocation for distribution functions
00065  ALLOCATE(    f(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax,0:fdim) )
00066  ALLOCATE(    g(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax,0:gdim) )
00067  ALLOCATE( fbar(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax,0:fdim) )
00068  ALLOCATE( gbar(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax,0:gdim) )
00069 
00070 ! Memory allocation for differential terms
00071  ALLOCATE(  gradRhoX(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00072  ALLOCATE(  gradRhoY(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00073  ALLOCATE( gradRhoSq(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00074  ALLOCATE( gradRhoXX(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00075  ALLOCATE( gradRhoXY(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00076  ALLOCATE( gradRhoYY(xmin:xmax,ymin:ymax) )
00077 
00078  ELSE
00079 
00080 ! Free hydrodynamics and neighbor arrays
00081  DEALLOCATE( p )
00082  DEALLOCATE( u )
00083  DEALLOCATE( ni )
00084  DEALLOCATE( rho )
00085  DEALLOCATE( psi )
00086 
00087 ! Free distribution function arrays
00088  DEALLOCATE( f )
00089  DEALLOCATE( g )
00090  DEALLOCATE( fbar )
00091  DEALLOCATE( gbar )
00092 
00093 ! Free differential term arrays
00094  DEALLOCATE( gradRhoX )
00095  DEALLOCATE( gradRhoY )
00096  DEALLOCATE( gradRhoSq )
00097  DEALLOCATE( gradRhoXX )
00098  DEALLOCATE( gradRhoXY )
00099  DEALLOCATE( gradRhoYY )
00100  END IF
00101 
00102  RETURN
00103  END SUBROUTINE MemAlloc
00104
